notes: Voters can register at a polling center up to and including Election Day.
Voters living overseas have until 2018-10-22 to register to vote.
If a voter has not registered prior to Election Day he or she may do so at the polling place.
Voters in Illinois can register to vote on any day, including Election Day
You may register and vote on election day. To do so, you first must go to the correct polling place for your current address on election day.
Kansas still has 2016 information on their website, so this is out best guess at the moment.

Voters can register on election day at a local election office or city hall. The deadline to register by mail or through a voter registration drive is the close of business on the 21st day before the election: 2018-10-16

The deadline to register online is 11:59 p.m., 21 days before Election Day. The deadline to register on paper is 5 p.m., 21 days before Election Day. Otherwise, you can register on Election Day at your polling place.
10/9/2018 is the deadline to register to vote by mail

Regular voter registration closes at 5 p.m. on 2018-10-09.
Individuals can late-register at the county election office beginning the next day and through close of polls on election day.
In-person deadline is 2018-10-16; online voter registration deadline is 2018-10-18
GENERAL ELECTION DAY- November 6, 2018 - unregistered voters may register and vote on this day.
Voters do not register in North Dakota

DPS is upgrading its computer system and will be able to accommodate online voter registration when the new system is in place, however this update is expected to take some time. We expect full online voter registration will be available in 2020. In the meantime, election board officials worked with legislators in 2017 on a bill that authorizes a phase one of online registration, which will allow those already registered to update their address and party affiliation online. We are currently testing that system and expect it will be ready later in 2018."

column7: you may register to vote up to and including the day of the election. However
column8: if you register online the day before the election or on Election Day
column9: your application may not be processed and your name may not appear on the checklist and you may be asked to fill out another application at the polls. To be sure your name appears on the checklist
column10: please register by the Friday before the election."
